alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Montgomery; Treutlen; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:47PM EDT until June 14 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Laurens County in central Georgia... Southwestern Treutlen County in east central Georgia... Northeastern Wheeler County in central Georgia... Northwestern Montgomery County in central Georgia... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 446 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cedar Grove, or 11 miles northwest of Alamo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Soperton, Mount Vernon, Glenwood, Ailey, Tarrytown, Lothair, Landsburg, Cedar Grove, Lowery, Barnhill, Zaidee and Kibbee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
